scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist/app.js
scripts.dev: echo 'Run frontend and backend separately in dev mode'
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test && cd .. && npx playwright test
